title: Multi-Language Dependency Update Analysis
description: Analyzes project dependencies across multiple languages and package managers, identifying outdated packages with security and compatibility risk assessment.
template:
Analyze the dependencies for {{project_name}} using {{package_manager}}. Review the current dependency manifest and:

1. List all outdated dependencies with current and latest versions
2. Categorize updates by severity: CRITICAL (security), HIGH (breaking changes), MEDIUM (minor versions), LOW (patches)
3. Identify transitive dependency conflicts
4. Assess compatibility risks for each major version bump
5. Provide a prioritized update roadmap with justification
6. Suggest version pinning strategies

Package Manager: {{package_manager}}
Language: {{language}}
Current manifest file content:
{{manifest_content}}

Output as a structured table with columns: Package | Current | Latest | Severity | Risk Assessment | Recommendation

project_name.description: Name of the project being analyzed

manifest_content.description: Content of package.json, pom.xml, build.gradle, requirements.txt, etc.

examples.output_outline: Table showing express 4.17.1→4.18.2 (MEDIUM, minor API changes), lodash 4.17.19→4.17.21 (CRITICAL, prototype pollution CVE), with risk assessments and update order recommendation
